title: Stolen Obsession
description: Manhattan antiquities valuator Annalisse Drury isn't one to believe in curses - but that's before her best friend is discovered in a shallow grave upstate with an ancient Persian bracelet suspiciously missing from her wrist.Now, a second item from that same collection has turned up at the opening of a glamorous art gallery in Lower Manhattan, and Annalisse is convinced that its new owner - wealthy socialite Generosa Zavos - will also be in danger as long as the necklace remains in her possession.Generosa's son, devastatingly handsome Alec Zavos, initially dismisses Annalisse's concerns - but when his parents are brutally removed from their luxury yacht while sailing the Aegean Sea, he and Annalisse embark on a race against time for themâ€”before the cursed jewelry claims even more lives.Thrust together in the unlikeliest of circumstances, Annalisse soon discovers there's much more to Alec than his womanizing reputation had suggested - but with Generosa's life at stake, and the crosshairs of a killer on both their backs, they don't have time to explore the attraction growing between them. They've got to unravel the mystery of this 500-year-old curse - before the two of them become its latest victims!Stolen Obsession is the first in Marlene M. Bell's thrilling Annalisse series - an explosive romantic suspense mystery sure to delight fans of Kathy Reichs and Dan Brown.
author: Marlene M. Bell
